00029 */
00030 clParentFrame::clParentFrame(wxWindow *parent, const wxWindowID id, const wxString& title, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, const long style):
00031                              clMainFrame(parent, id, title, pos, size, style)
00032 {
00033   geometryFrame    = NULL;
00034   surfaceGridFrame = NULL;
00035   volumeGridFrame  = NULL;
00036 
00037   geometry    = NULL;
00038   surfaceGrid = NULL;
00039   volumeGrid  = NULL;
00040 
00041   // Give it an icon
00042 #ifdef __WXMSW__
00043   SetIcon(wxIcon("child_icn"));
00044 #else
00045   SetIcon(wxIcon("gridLab_xpm"));
00046 #endif
00047 
00048   Report("Welcome to gridLab\n\n");
00049 }
00050 
00051 clParentFrame::~clParentFrame(void)
00052 {
00053     if(geometry)    delete geometry;
00054     if(surfaceGrid) delete surfaceGrid;
00055     if(volumeGrid)  delete volumeGrid;
00056 
00057     // The following frames are automatically deleted by the AUIManager
00058 //    if(geometryFrame)    delete geometryFrame;
00059 //    if(surfaceGridFrame) delete surfaceGridFrame;
00060 //    if(volumeGridFrame)  delete volumeGridFrame;
00061 }

00063 /*
00064 ** Methods for managing the children
00065 */
00066 void clParentFrame::CreateGeometryFrame(wxString name)
00067 {
00068   try
00069   {
00070     // Create a new child frame, containing a canvas
00071     geometryFrame = new clGeometryFrame(noteBook, name, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxDEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE, geometry);
00072     if(!noteBook->AddPage(geometryFrame, name, true))
00073     {
00074       clExceptionTree *EX = new clExceptionTree("clParentFrame", "CreateGeometryFrame", "Failed to add geometryFrame to noteBook");
00075       throw(EX);
00076     }
00077   }
00078 
00079   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00080   {
00081     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::CreateGeometryFrame");
00082     throw(EX);
00083   }
00084 }
00085

00126 void clParentFrame::CloseFile(void)
00127 {
00128   try
00129   {
00130     if(geometry)    delete geometry;
00131     if(surfaceGrid) delete surfaceGrid;
00132     if(volumeGrid)  delete volumeGrid;
00133 
00134     geometry    = NULL;
00135     surfaceGrid = NULL;
00136     volumeGrid  = NULL;
00137 
00138     if(geometryFrame)    geometryFrame->Close();
00139     if(surfaceGridFrame) surfaceGridFrame->Close();
00140     if(volumeGridFrame)  volumeGridFrame->Close();
00141 
00142     geometryFrame    = NULL;
00143     surfaceGridFrame = NULL;
00144     volumeGridFrame  = NULL;
00145 
00146     treeControl->DeleteAllItems();
00147   }
00148 
00149   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00150   {
00151     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::CloseFile");
00152     throw(EX);
00153   }
00154 }
00155 
00156 void clParentFrame::Report(wxString message)
00157 {
00158   try
00159   {
00160     textWindow->AppendText(message);
00161     wxSafeYield();
00162   }
00163 
00164   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00165   {
00166     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::Report");
00167     throw(EX);
00168   }
00169 }
00170 
00171 void clParentFrame::CreateTree(wxString fileName)
00172 {
00173   try
00174   {
00175     clTreeItemData *rootItemData  = new clTreeItemData(0, itRoot);
00176     wxTreeItemId   rootID         = treeControl->AddRoot(fileName, -1, -1, rootItemData);
00177 
00178     clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00179     wxTreeItemId   dummyID        = treeControl->AppendItem(rootID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00180   }
00181 
00182   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00183   {
00184     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::CreateGeometryTree");
00185     throw(EX);
00186   }
00187 }
00188 
00189 void clParentFrame::OnExpandTree(wxTreeEvent& event)
00190 {
00191   try
00192   {
00193     wxTreeItemId    itemID   = event.GetItem();
00194     clTreeItemData *itemData = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));
00195     enItemType      itemType = itemData->GetItemType();
00196 
00197     if(itemType == itDummy)
00198     {
00199       clExceptionTree *EX = new clExceptionTree("clParentFrame", "OnExpandTree", "Item does not have any children");
00200       throw(EX);
00201     }
00202     else
00203     {
00204       // Determine the type of the item
00205       wxTreeItemId    theLastChildID = treeControl->GetLastChild(itemID);
00206       clTreeItemData *itemData       = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(theLastChildID));
00207 
00208       if(itemData->GetItemType() == itDummy)
00209       {
00210         // Delete the dummy entry
00211         treeControl->DeleteChildren(itemID);
00212 
00213         // Determine the type of the item
00214         clTreeItemData *itemData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));
00215         enItemType      itemType  = itemData->GetItemType();
00216 
00217         switch (itemType)
00218         {
00219           case itRoot:
00220           {
00221             if(geometry)
00222             {
00223               // Add geometry
00224               int             numberID = geometry->GetNumberID();
00225               clTreeItemData *itemData = new clTreeItemData(numberID, itGeometry);
00226 
00227               wxString itemText = wxString::Format("Geometry (ID = %d)", numberID);
00228               wxTreeItemId    geoID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00229 
00230               // Add dummy entry in order to display a '+' in fromt of the item.
00231               clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00232               wxTreeItemId    dummyID       = treeControl->AppendItem(geoID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00233             }
00234 
00235             if(surfaceGrid)
00236             {
00237               // Add surfaceGrid
00238               int             numberID = surfaceGrid->GetNumberID();
00239               clTreeItemData *itemData = new clTreeItemData(numberID, itSurfaceGrid);
00240 
00241               wxString        itemText = wxString::Format("SurfaceGrid (ID = %d)", numberID);
00242               wxTreeItemId    surfID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00243 
00244               // Add dummy entry in order to display a '+' in fromt of the item.
00245               clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00246               wxTreeItemId    dummyID       = treeControl->AppendItem(surfID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00247             }
00248 
00249             if(volumeGrid)
00250             {
00251               // Add volumeGrid
00252               int             numberID = volumeGrid->GetNumberID();
00253               clTreeItemData *itemData = new clTreeItemData(numberID, itVolumeGrid);
00254 
00255               wxString itemText = wxString::Format("VolumeGrid (ID = %d)", numberID);
00256               wxTreeItemId    volID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00257 
00258               // Add dummy entry in order to display a '+' in fromt of the item.
00259               clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00260               wxTreeItemId   dummyID        = treeControl->AppendItem(volID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00261             }
00262             break;
00263           }
00264 
00265           case itGeometry:
00266           {
00267             // Add surfaces
00268             for(int s=0; s<geometry->GetNumberSurfaces(); s++)
00269             {
00270               clSurface      *theSurface = geometry->GetSurfacePointer(s);
00271               int             numberID   = theSurface->GetNumberID();
00272               clTreeItemData *itemData   = new clTreeItemData(numberID, s, itSurface);
00273 
00274               wxString itemText = wxString::Format("Surface (ID = %d)", numberID);
00275               wxTreeItemId    surfID     = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID,itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00276 
00277               // Add dummy entry
00278               clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00279               wxTreeItemId    dummyID       = treeControl->AppendItem(surfID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00280             }
00281             break;
00282           }
00283 
00284           case itSurface:
00285           {
00286             // Get surface
00287             clTreeItemData *itemData     = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));
00288             int             surfaceEntry = itemData->GetItemIndex();
00289             clSurface      *surface      = geometry->GetSurfacePointer(surfaceEntry);
00290 
00291             // Add patches
00292             for(int p=0; p<surface->GetNumberPatches(); p++)
00293             {
00294               clPatch        *thePatch   = surface->GetPatchPointer(p);
00295               int             numberID   = thePatch->GetNumberID();
00296               clTreeItemData *itemData   = new clTreeItemData(numberID, p, itPatch);
00297 
00298               wxString itemText = wxString::Format("Patch (ID = %d)", numberID);
00299               wxTreeItemId    patchID     = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00300 
00301               // Add dummy entry
00302               clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00303               wxTreeItemId    dummyID       = treeControl->AppendItem(patchID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00304             }
00305             break;
00306           }
00307 
00308           case itPatch:
00309           {
00310             // Add points
00311             for(int p=0; p<4; p++)
00312             {
00313               clTreeItemData *itemData = new clTreeItemData(p, p, itPoint);
00314 
00315               wxString itemText = wxString::Format("Point (ID = %d)", p);
00316               wxTreeItemId    pointID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00317 
00318               // Add dummy entry
00319               clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00320               wxTreeItemId    dummyID       = treeControl->AppendItem(pointID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00321             }
00322             break;
00323           }
00324 
00325           case itPoint:
00326           {
00327             // Get point
00328             clTreeItemData *pointData   = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));
00329             int             pointEntry  = pointData->GetItemIndex();
00330 
00331             // Get patch
00332             wxTreeItemId    patchID     = treeControl->GetItemParent(itemID);
00333             clTreeItemData *patchData   = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(patchID));
00334             int             patchEntry  = patchData->GetItemIndex();
00335 
00336             // Get surface
00337             wxTreeItemId    surfaceID    = treeControl->GetItemParent(patchID);
00338             clTreeItemData *surfaceData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(surfaceID));
00339             int             surfaceEntry = surfaceData->GetItemIndex();
00340 
00341             clSurface      *surface     = geometry->GetSurfacePointer(surfaceEntry);
00342             clPatch        *patch       = surface->GetPatchPointer(patchEntry);
00343 
00344             // Add coordinates
00345             double u, v;
00346 
00347             switch(pointEntry)
00348             {
00349               case 0:
00350                 u=0.0;
00351                 v=0.0;
00352                 break;
00353 
00354               case 1:
00355                 u=1.0;
00356                 v=0.0;
00357                 break;
00358 
00359               case 2:
00360                 u=0.0;
00361                 v=1.0;
00362                 break;
00363 
00364               case 3:
00365                 u=1.0;
00366                 v=1.0;
00367                 break;
00368 
00369               default:
00370                 clExceptionTree *EX = new clExceptionTree("clParentFrame", "OnExpandTree", "Invalid Point Entry.");
00371                 throw(EX);
00372                 break;
00373             }
00374 
00375             wxString itemText;
00376             tpMatrix<double> coord = patch->GetCoordinates(u, v);
00377 
00378             itemText = wxString::Format("X = %f", coord(1,1));
00379             clTreeItemData *xData = new clTreeItemData(0, 0, itValue);
00380             wxTreeItemId    xID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, xData);
00381 
00382             itemText = wxString::Format("Y = %f", coord(1,2));
00383             clTreeItemData *yData = new clTreeItemData(1, 1, itValue);
00384             wxTreeItemId    yID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, yData);
00385 
00386             itemText = wxString::Format("Z = %f", coord(1,3));
00387             clTreeItemData *zData = new clTreeItemData(2, 2, itValue);
00388             wxTreeItemId    zID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, zData);
00389 
00390             break;
00391           }
00392 
00393           case itVolumeGrid:
00394           {
00395             // Add elements
00396             for(int e=0; e<volumeGrid->GetNumberElements(); e++)
00397             {
00398               clTetrahedron theElement = volumeGrid->GetElement(e);
00399               if(!theElement.IsHalo())
00400               {
00401                 int             numberID     = theElement.GetNumberID();
00402                 clTreeItemData *itemData     = new clTreeItemData(numberID, e, itElement3D);
00403 
00404                 wxString itemText = wxString::Format("Element (ID = %d)", numberID);
00405                 wxTreeItemId    elementID    = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00406 
00407                 // Add dummy entry
00408                 clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00409                 wxTreeItemId    dummyID       = treeControl->AppendItem(elementID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00410               }
00411             }
00412 
00413             // Add nodes
00414             for(int n=0; n<volumeGrid->GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00415             {
00416               clNode3D          theNode    = volumeGrid->GetNode(n);
00417               int             numberID   = theNode.GetNumberID();
00418               clTreeItemData *itemData   = new clTreeItemData(numberID, n, itNode3D);
00419 
00420               wxString itemText = wxString::Format("Node (ID = %d)", numberID);
00421               wxTreeItemId    nodeID     = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00422 
00423               // Add dummy entry
00424               clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00425               wxTreeItemId    dummyID       = treeControl->AppendItem(nodeID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00426             }
00427             break;
00428           }
00429 
00430           case itSurfaceGrid:
00431           {
00432             // Add elements
00433             for(int e=0; e<surfaceGrid->GetNumberElements(); e++)
00434             {
00435               clTriangle *theElement = surfaceGrid->GetElementPointer(e);
00436               if(!theElement->IsHalo())
00437               {
00438                 int             numberID     = theElement->GetNumberID();
00439                 clTreeItemData *itemData     = new clTreeItemData(numberID, e, itElement2D);
00440 
00441                 wxString itemText = wxString::Format("Element (ID = %d)", numberID);
00442                 wxTreeItemId    elementID    = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00443 
00444                 // Add dummy entry
00445                 clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00446                 wxTreeItemId    dummyID       = treeControl->AppendItem(elementID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00447               }
00448             }
00449 
00450             // Add nodes
00451 //            for(int n=0; n<surfaceGrid->GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00452 //            {
00453 //              clNode3D       *theNode    = surfaceGrid->GetNodePointer(n);
00454 //              int             numberID   = theNode->GetNumberID();
00455 //              clTreeItemData *itemData   = new clTreeItemData(numberID, n, itNode3D);
00456 //
00457 //              wxString        itemText   = wxString::Format("Node (ID = %d)", numberID);

00459 //
00460 //              // Add dummy entry

00462 //              wxTreeItemId    dummyID       = treeControl->AppendItem(nodeID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00463 //            }
00464             break;
00465           }
00466 
00467           case itElement2D:
00468           {
00469             // Get the element
00470             clTreeItemData *elementData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));
00471             int             elementIndex = elementData->GetItemIndex();
00472             clTriangle     *theElement   = surfaceGrid->GetElementPointer(elementIndex);
00473 
00474             // Add faces
00475             for(int f=0; f<theElement->GetNumberFaces(); f++)
00476             {
00477               clTreeItemData *itemData = new clTreeItemData(f, f, itFace3D);
00478 
00479               wxString itemText = wxString::Format("Face (IN = %d)", f);
00480               wxTreeItemId faceID = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00481 
00482               // Add dummy entry
00483               clTreeItemData *dummyItemData = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00484               wxTreeItemId    dummyID       = treeControl->AppendItem(faceID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData);
00485             }
00486 
00487             // Add node IDs
00488             for(int n=0; n<theElement->GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00489             {
00490               int             theNodeID = theElement->GetNodeID(n);
00491               clTreeItemData *itemData  = new clTreeItemData(theNodeID, n, itValue);
00492 
00493               wxString     itemText = wxString::Format("Node (ID = %d)", theNodeID);
00494               wxTreeItemId nodeID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00495             }
00496 
00497             // Add radius
00498             double          theRadius  = theElement->GetRadiusCircumcircle();
00499             clTreeItemData *radiusData = new clTreeItemData(0, 0, itValue);
00500 
00501             wxString itemText;
00502             itemText = wxString::Format("Radius = %f", theRadius);
00503             wxTreeItemId radiusID = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, radiusData);
00504 
00505             // Add area
00506             double          theArea  = theElement->GetArea();
00507             clTreeItemData *areaData = new clTreeItemData(0, 0, itValue);
00508 
00509             itemText = wxString::Format("Area = %f", theArea);
00510             wxTreeItemId volumeID = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, areaData);
00511 
00512             // Add circumcentre
00513             clTreeItemData *circumCentreData = new clTreeItemData(0, 0, itCircumCentre2D);
00514             wxTreeItemId    circumCentreID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, "CircumCentre", -1, -1, circumCentreData);
00515 
00516             // Add dummy entry

00519 
00520             // Add centroid

00522             wxTreeItemId    centroidID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, "Centroid", -1, -1, centroidData);
00523 
00524             // Add dummy entry
00525             clTreeItemData *dummyItemData2 = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00526             wxTreeItemId    dummyID2       = treeControl->AppendItem(centroidID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData2);
00527 
00528             break;
00529           }
00530 
00531           case itElement3D:
00532           {
00533             // Get the element
00534             clTreeItemData *elementData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));

00537 
00538             // Add faces
00539             for(int f=0; f<theElement->GetNumberFaces(); f++)

00587 
00588             // Add dummy entry
00589             clTreeItemData *dummyItemData2 = new clTreeItemData(0, itDummy);
00590             wxTreeItemId   dummyID2        = treeControl->AppendItem(centroidID, "DUMMY", -1, -1, dummyItemData2);
00591 
00592             break;
00593           }
00594 
00595           case itFace2D:
00596           {
00597             // Get the element
00598             wxTreeItemId    theElementID    = treeControl->GetItemParent(itemID);
00599             clTreeItemData *theElementData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(theElementID));
00600             int             theElementIndex = theElementData->GetItemIndex();
00601             clTriangle     *theElement      = surfaceGrid->GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00602 
00603             // Get the face
00604             clTreeItemData *theFaceData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));
00605             int             theFaceIndex = theFaceData->GetItemIndex();
00606 
00607             // Add neighbour ID
00608             int             theNeighbourID = theElement->GetNeighbourID(theFaceIndex);
00609             clTreeItemData *itemData       = new clTreeItemData(theNeighbourID, theFaceIndex, itNeighbour);
00610 
00611             wxString itemText      = wxString::Format("Neighbour (ID = %d)", theNeighbourID);
00612             wxTreeItemId newItemID = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00613 
00614             // Add node IDs
00615             int faceNodes[theElement->GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00616             theElement->GetFaceNodes(theFaceIndex, faceNodes);
00617             for(int n=0; n<theElement->GetNumberFaceNodes(); n++)
00618             {
00619               int             theNodeID = faceNodes[n];
00620               clTreeItemData *itemData  = new clTreeItemData(theNodeID, n, itValue);
00621 
00622               wxString     itemText = wxString::Format("Node (IN = %d)", theNodeID);
00623               wxTreeItemId nodeID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00624             }
00625             break;
00626           }
00627 
00628           case itFace3D:
00629           {
00630             // Get the element
00631             wxTreeItemId    theElementID    = treeControl->GetItemParent(itemID);
00632             clTreeItemData *theElementData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(theElementID));
00633             int             theElementIndex = theElementData->GetItemIndex();
00634             clTetrahedron   theElement      = volumeGrid->GetElement(theElementIndex);
00635 
00636             // Get the face
00637             clTreeItemData *theFaceData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));
00638             int             theFaceIndex = theFaceData->GetItemIndex();
00639 
00640             // Add neighbour ID
00641             int             theNeighbourID = theElement.GetNeighbourID(theFaceIndex);
00642             clTreeItemData *itemData       = new clTreeItemData(theNeighbourID, theFaceIndex, itNeighbour);
00643 
00644             wxString itemText = wxString::Format("Neighbour (ID = %d)", theNeighbourID);
00645             wxTreeItemId newItemID = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00646 
00647             // Add node IDs
00648             int faceNodes[theElement.GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00649             theElement.GetFaceNodes(theFaceIndex, faceNodes);
00650             for(int n=0; n<theElement.GetNumberFaceNodes(); n++)
00651             {
00652               int             theNodeID = faceNodes[n];
00653               clTreeItemData *itemData  = new clTreeItemData(theNodeID, n, itValue);
00654 
00655               wxString itemText = wxString::Format("Node (IN = %d)", theNodeID);
00656               wxTreeItemId nodeID = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00657             }
00658             break;
00659           }
00660 
00661           case itNode2D:
00662           {
00663 //            // Get the node
00664 //            clTreeItemData *theNodeData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));
00665 //            int             theNodeIndex = theNodeData->GetItemIndex();
00666 //            clNode2D       *theNode      = surfaceGrid->GetNodePointer(theNodeIndex);
00667 //
00668 //            wxString itemText;
00669 //            tpMatrix<double> coord = theNode->GetCoordinates();
00670 //
00671 //            itemText = wxString::Format("X = %f", coord(1,1));
00672 //            clTreeItemData *xData = new clTreeItemData(0, 0, itValue);
00673 //            wxTreeItemId    xID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, xData);
00674 //
00675 //            itemText = wxString::Format("Y = %f", coord(2,1));
00676 //            clTreeItemData *yData = new clTreeItemData(1, 1, itValue);
00677 //            wxTreeItemId    yID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, yData);
00678 //
00679 //            // Add element IDs
00680 //            for(int e=0; e<theNode->GetNumberElements(); e++)
00681 //            {
00682 //              int             theElementID = theNode->GetElementID(e);
00683 //              clTreeItemData *itemData     = new clTreeItemData(theElementID, e, itValue);
00684 //
00685 //              wxString     itemText = wxString::Format("Element (ID = %d)", theElementID);
00686 //              wxTreeItemId nodeID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00687 //            }
00688 //            break;
00689           }
00690 
00691           case itNode3D:
00692           {
00693             // Get the node
00694             clTreeItemData *theNodeData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));
00695             int             theNodeIndex = theNodeData->GetItemIndex();
00696             clNode3D       *theNode      = volumeGrid->GetNodePointer(theNodeIndex);
00697 
00698             wxString itemText;
00699             tpMatrix<double> coord = theNode->GetCoordinates();
00700 
00701             itemText = wxString::Format("X = %f", coord(1,1));
00702             clTreeItemData *xData = new clTreeItemData(0, 0, itValue);
00703             wxTreeItemId    xID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, xData);
00704 
00705             itemText = wxString::Format("Y = %f", coord(2,1));
00706             clTreeItemData *yData = new clTreeItemData(1, 1, itValue);
00707             wxTreeItemId    yID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, yData);
00708 
00709             itemText = wxString::Format("Z = %f", coord(3,1));
00710             clTreeItemData *zData = new clTreeItemData(2, 2, itValue);
00711             wxTreeItemId    zID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, zData);
00712 
00713             // Add element IDs
00714             for(int e=0; e<theNode->GetNumberElements(); e++)
00715             {
00716               int             theElementID = theNode->GetElementID(e);
00717               clTreeItemData *itemData  = new clTreeItemData(theElementID, e, itValue);
00718 
00719               wxString     itemText = wxString::Format("Element (ID = %d)", theElementID);
00720               wxTreeItemId nodeID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, itemData);
00721             }
00722             break;
00723           }
00724 
00725           case itCircumCentre2D:
00726           {
00727             // Get the element
00728             wxTreeItemId      theElementID    = treeControl->GetItemParent(itemID);
00729             clTreeItemData   *theElementData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(theElementID));
00730             int               theElementIndex = theElementData->GetItemIndex();
00731             clTriangle       *theElement      = surfaceGrid->GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00732             clNode2D          circumCentre    = theElement->GetCircumCentre();
00733 
00734             wxString itemText;
00735 
00736             itemText = wxString::Format("X = %f", circumCentre.x());
00737             clTreeItemData *xData = new clTreeItemData(0, 0, itValue);
00738             wxTreeItemId    xID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, xData);
00739 
00740             itemText = wxString::Format("Y = %f", circumCentre.y());
00741             clTreeItemData *yData = new clTreeItemData(1, 1, itValue);
00742             wxTreeItemId    yID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, yData);
00743 
00744             break;
00745           }
00746 
00747           case itCircumCentre3D:
00748           {
00749             // Get the element
00750             wxTreeItemId      theElementID    = treeControl->GetItemParent(itemID);
00751             clTreeItemData   *theElementData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(theElementID));
00752             int               theElementIndex = theElementData->GetItemIndex();
00753             clTetrahedron    *theElement      = volumeGrid->GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00754             clNode3D          circumCentre    = theElement->GetCircumCentre();
00755 
00756             wxString itemText;
00757 
00758             itemText = wxString::Format("X = %f", circumCentre.x());
00759             clTreeItemData *xData = new clTreeItemData(0, 0, itValue);
00760             wxTreeItemId    xID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, xData);
00761 
00762             itemText = wxString::Format("Y = %f", circumCentre.y());
00763             clTreeItemData *yData = new clTreeItemData(1, 1, itValue);
00764             wxTreeItemId    yID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, yData);
00765 
00766             itemText = wxString::Format("Z = %f", circumCentre.z());
00767             clTreeItemData *zData = new clTreeItemData(2, 2, itValue);
00768             wxTreeItemId    zID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, zData);
00769 
00770             break;
00771           }
00772 
00773           case itCentroid2D:
00774           {
00775             // Get the element
00776             wxTreeItemId      theElementID    = treeControl->GetItemParent(itemID);
00777             clTreeItemData   *theElementData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(theElementID));
00778             int               theElementIndex = theElementData->GetItemIndex();
00779             clTriangle       *theElement      = surfaceGrid->GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00780             clNode2D          centroid        = theElement->GetCentroid();
00781 
00782             wxString itemText;
00783 
00784             itemText = wxString::Format("X = %f", centroid.x());
00785             clTreeItemData *xData = new clTreeItemData(0, 0, itValue);
00786             wxTreeItemId    xID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, xData);
00787 
00788             itemText = wxString::Format("Y = %f", centroid.y());
00789             clTreeItemData *yData = new clTreeItemData(1, 1, itValue);
00790             wxTreeItemId    yID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, yData);
00791 
00792             break;
00793           }
00794 
00795           case itCentroid3D:
00796           {
00797             // Get the element
00798             wxTreeItemId      theElementID    = treeControl->GetItemParent(itemID);
00799             clTreeItemData   *theElementData  = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(theElementID));
00800             int               theElementIndex = theElementData->GetItemIndex();
00801             clTetrahedron    *theElement      = volumeGrid->GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00802             clNode3D          centroid        = theElement->GetCentroid();
00803 
00804             wxString itemText;
00805 
00806             itemText = wxString::Format("X = %f", centroid.x());
00807             clTreeItemData *xData = new clTreeItemData(0, 0, itValue);
00808             wxTreeItemId    xID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, xData);
00809 
00810             itemText = wxString::Format("Y = %f", centroid.y());
00811             clTreeItemData *yData = new clTreeItemData(1, 1, itValue);
00812             wxTreeItemId    yID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, yData);
00813 
00814             itemText = wxString::Format("Z = %f", centroid.z());
00815             clTreeItemData *zData = new clTreeItemData(2, 2, itValue);
00816             wxTreeItemId    zID   = treeControl->AppendItem(itemID, itemText, -1, -1, zData);
00817 
00818             break;
00819           }
00820 
00821           default:
00822           {
00823             clExceptionTree *EX = new clExceptionTree("clParentFrame", "OnExpandTree", "Unknown item type.");
00824             throw(EX);
00825 
00826             break;
00827           }
00828         }
00829       }
00830     }
00831   }
00832 
00833   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00834   {
00835     char *string = NULL;
00836 
00837     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::OnExpandTree");
00838     string = EX.PrintError(string);
00839     Report(string);
00840   }
00841 }
00842 
00843 void clParentFrame::OnSelectionChanged(wxTreeEvent& event)
00844 {
00845   try
00846   {
00847     int highLightObjects[3];
00848 
00849     wxTreeItemId   itemID = event.GetItem();
00850     clTreeItemData *itemData     = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(itemID));
00851     enItemType     itemType      = itemData->GetItemType();
00852     int            itemIndex     = itemData->GetItemIndex();
00853 
00854     switch (itemType)
00855     {
00856       case itElement3D:
00857       {
00858         highLightObjects[0] = itemIndex;
00859         highLightObjects[1] = -1;
00860         highLightObjects[2] = -1;
00861 
00862         volumeGridFrame->SetHighLight(hlElement, highLightObjects);
00863         volumeGridFrame->RedrawCanvas();
00864         break;
00865       }
00866 
00867       case itFace3D:
00868       {
00869         wxTreeItemId   theParentID = treeControl->GetItemParent(itemID);
00870         clTreeItemData *parentData = (clTreeItemData*)(treeControl->GetItemData(theParentID));
00871         int            parentIndex = parentData->GetItemIndex();
00872 
00873         highLightObjects[0] = parentIndex;
00874         highLightObjects[1] = itemIndex;
00875         highLightObjects[2] = -1;
00876 
00877         volumeGridFrame->SetHighLight(hlFace, highLightObjects);
00878         volumeGridFrame->RedrawCanvas();
00879         break;
00880       }
00881 
00882       case itNeighbour:
00883       {
00884         int elementID    = itemData->GetItemID();
00885         int elementIndex = volumeGrid->GetElementIndex(elementID);
00886 
00887         highLightObjects[0] = elementIndex;
00888         highLightObjects[1] = -1;
00889         highLightObjects[2] = -1;
00890 
00891         volumeGridFrame->SetHighLight(hlElement, highLightObjects);
00892         volumeGridFrame->RedrawCanvas();
00893         break;
00894       }
00895 
00896       default:
00897       {
00898         highLightObjects[0] = -1;
00899         highLightObjects[1] = -1;
00900         highLightObjects[2] = -1;
00901 
00902         if(volumeGridFrame)
00903         {
00904           volumeGridFrame->SetHighLight(hlNone, highLightObjects);
00905           volumeGridFrame->RedrawCanvas();
00906         }
00907         break;
00908       }
00909     }
00910   }
00911 
00912   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00913   {
00914     char *string = NULL;
00915 
00916     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::OnSelectionChanged");
00917     string = EX.PrintError(string);
00918     Report(string);
00919   }
00920 }
00921

00929

00931 }
00932 
00933 void clParentFrame::OnOpenFile(wxCommandEvent& event)
00934 {
00935   try
00936   {
00937     wxString fileName = wxFileSelector("Open file", NULL, NULL, "*.geo", "Geometry files (*.geo)|*.geo|Dump files (*.dmp)|*.dmp|All files (*)|*", wxOPEN, this, -1, -1);
00938     if(!fileName.IsEmpty())
00939     {
00940       CloseFile();
00941 
00942       // Return message in textWindow
00943       wxString message;
00944       message = wxT("Reading file ") + wxFileNameFromPath(fileName) + wxT("s...\n");
00945       Report(message);
00946 
00947       wxString fileExtention = fileName.Mid(fileName.Find('.', TRUE));
00948       if(fileExtention.CmpNoCase("geo"))
00949       {
00950         geometry = new clGeometry();
00951         clReader   reader(fileName, *geometry);
00952 
00953         Report("Building Geometry Frame...\n");
00954         CreateGeometryFrame("Geometry");
00955 
00956         Report("Building Tree...\n");
00957         CreateTree(wxFileNameFromPath(fileName));
00958       }
00959       else if(fileExtention.CmpNoCase("dmp"))
00960       {
00961       }
00962 
00963     }
00964 
00965     Report("Done.\n\n");
00966   }
00967 
00968   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00969   {
00970     char *string = NULL;
00971 
00972     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::OnOpenFile");
00973     string = EX.PrintError(string);
00974     Report(string);
00975   }
00976 }
00977

00980   wxString fileName = wxFileSelector("Save file", NULL, NULL, "geo", "*.geo", wxSAVE, this, -1, -1);
00981   if(!fileName.IsEmpty())
00982   {
00983     // Return message in textWindow
00984     wxString message;
00985     message = wxT("Writing file ") + wxFileNameFromPath(fileName) + wxT("...\n");
00986     Report(message);
00987 
00988 //    clWriter writer(fileName, foGNU, geometry);
00989 
00990     Report("Done.\n\n");
00991   }
00992 }

01025 void clParentFrame::OnSurfaceGrid(wxCommandEvent& event)
01026 {
01027   try
01028   {
01029     if(!surfaceGrid)
01030     {
01031       Report("Creating Surface Grid...\n");
01032       surfaceGrid = new clSurfaceGrid(0);
01033 
01034       Report("Building SurfaceGrid Frame...\n");
01035       CreateSurfaceGridFrame("Surface Grid");
01036     }
01037     else
01038     {
01039 //    static int s = -1;
01040 //
01041 //      s++;
01042 //
01043 //      if(s<geometry->GetNumberSurfaces())
01044 //      {
01045 //        wxString message = wxString::Format("Applying grid to surface %d\n", s);
01046 //        Report(message);
01047 //
01048 //        clSurface *surface = geometry->GetSurfacePointer(s);
01049 //        surfaceGrid->CreateUnstructured(surface);
01050 //
01051 //        surfaceGridFrame->RedrawCanvas();
01052 //      }
01053 //    }
01054 //  }
01055 
01056 
01057       for(int s=0; s<geometry->GetNumberSurfaces(); s++)
01058       {
01059         wxString message = wxString::Format("Applying grid to surface %d...\n", s);
01060         Report(message);
01061 
01062         clSurface *surface = geometry->GetSurfacePointer(s);
01063         surfaceGrid->CreateUnstructured(surface, 15, 15, dtUniform);
01064         surfaceGridFrame->RedrawCanvas();
01065       }
01066 
01067       Report("Checking grid...\n");
01068       surfaceGrid->CheckGrid();
01069     }
01070   }
01071 
01072   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01073   {
01074     char *string = NULL;
01075 
01076     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::OnSurfaceGrid");
01077     string = EX.PrintError(string);
01078     Report(string);
01079   }
01080 
01081   Report("Done.\n\n");
01082 }

01102 
01103 void clParentFrame::OnVolumeGrid(wxCommandEvent& event)
01104 {
01105   try
01106   {
01107     if(!volumeGrid)
01108     {
01109       volumeGrid = new clUnstructured3D();
01110 
01111       Report("Building VolumeGrid Frame...\n");
01112       CreateVolumeGridFrame("Volume Grid");
01113     }
01114     else
01115     {
01116       Report("Performing random centroid insertion...\n");
01117       volumeGrid->RandomCentroidInsertion(50);
01118       //RandomCircumCentreInsertion(10);
01119 
01120       Report("Deleting initial grid...\n");
01121       volumeGrid->DeleteInitialGrid();
01122 
01123       volumeGrid->RandomCentroidInsertion(50);
01124 
01125       Report("Correcting grid...\n");
01126       volumeGrid->CorrectGrid();
01127 
01128       Report("Verifying grid...\n");
01129       volumeGrid->CheckGrid();
01130 
01131       volumeGridFrame->RedrawCanvas();
01132     }
01133   }
01134 
01135   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01136   {
01137     char *string = NULL;
01138 
01139     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::OnVolumeGrid");
01140     string = EX.PrintError(string);
01141     Report(string);
01142   }
01143 
01144   Report("Done.\n\n");
01145 }
01146 
01147 void clParentFrame::RandomNodeInsertion(const int numberInsertions)
01148 {
01149   try
01150   {
01151     static int count = 0;
01152 
01153     //srand((unsigned)time(NULL));
01154     srand((unsigned)0);
01155 
01156     for(int i=0; i<numberInsertions; i++)
01157     {
01158       count++;
01159 
01160       wxString message = wxString::Format("Performing insertion:\t%d\n", count);
01161       Report(message);
01162 
01163       double x=rand();
01164       double y=rand();
01165       double z=rand();
01166 
01167       x/=RAND_MAX;
01168       y/=RAND_MAX;
01169       z/=RAND_MAX;
01170 
01171       message = wxString::Format("Coordinates:\t\tX = %f, Y = %f, Z = %f\n", x, y, z);
01172       Report(message);
01173 
01174       clNode3D *lastNode  = volumeGrid->GetNodePointer(volumeGrid->GetNumberNodes()-1);
01175       int     newNodeID = lastNode->GetNumberID()+1;
01176 
01177       clNode3D  newNode(newNodeID, x, y, z);
01178       newNodeID = volumeGrid->InsertNode(newNode);
01179 
01180       message = wxString::Format("New nodeID:\t\t%d\n", newNodeID);
01181       Report(message);
01182     }
01183   }
01184 
01185   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01186   {
01187     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::RandomNodeInsertion");
01188     throw EX;
01189   }
01190 }
01191 
01192 void clParentFrame::RandomCircumCentreInsertion(const int numberInsertions)
01193 {
01194   try
01195   {
01196     static int count = 0;
01197 
01198     //srand((unsigned)time(NULL));
01199     srand((unsigned)0);
01200 
01201     for(int i=0; i<numberInsertions; i++)
01202     {
01203       // Select a random tetrahedron - but not a halo tetrahedron
01204       int index = rand() % volumeGrid->GetNumberElements();
01205 
01206       clTetrahedron *theElement = volumeGrid->GetElementPointer(index);
01207       if(!theElement->IsHalo())
01208       {
01209         count++;
01210 
01211         wxString message = wxString::Format("Performing insertion:\t%d\n", count);
01212         Report(message);
01213 
01214         message = wxString::Format("Using centre of element:\t%d\n", theElement->GetNumberID() );
01215         Report(message);
01216         cout << message << endl;
01217 
01218         clNode3D circumCentre = theElement->GetCircumCentre();
01219 
01220         message = wxString::Format("Coordinates:\t\tX = %f, Y = %f, Z = %f\n", circumCentre.x(), circumCentre.y(), circumCentre.z());
01221         Report(message);
01222 
01223         // Create a new node in the Centroid
01224         clNode3D *lastNode  = volumeGrid->GetNodePointer(volumeGrid->GetNumberNodes()-1);
01225         int       newNodeID = lastNode->GetNumberID()+1;
01226 
01227         clNode3D  newNode(newNodeID, circumCentre.GetCoordinates());
01228         newNodeID = volumeGrid->InsertNode(newNode);
01229 
01230         message = wxString::Format("New nodeID:\t\t%d\n", newNodeID);
01231         Report(message);
01232 
01233 //        char fileName[25];
01234 //        sprintf(fileName, "volumeGrid_%d.csv\0", count);
01235 //        message = wxString::Format("Dumping grid to:\t\t%s\n", fileName);
01236 //        Report(message);
01237 //        volumeGrid->DumpGrid(fileName);
01238       }
01239       else
01240       {
01241         // Retry randomisation
01242         i--;
01243       }
01244     }
01245   }
01246 
01247   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01248   {
01249     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::RandomCircumCentreInsertion");
01250     throw EX;
01251   }
01252 }
01253 
01254 void clParentFrame::OnDumpGrid(wxCommandEvent& event)
01255 {
01256   try
01257   {
01258     wxString pageName = noteBook->GetPageText(noteBook->GetSelection());
01259 
01260     if (pageName == wxT("Volume Grid"))
01261     {
01262       Report("Dumping Volume Grid...\n");
01263       volumeGrid->DumpGrid();
01264     }
01265     else if (pageName == wxT("Surface Grid"))
01266     {
01267       Report("Dumping Surface Grid...\n");
01268       surfaceGrid->DumpGrid();
01269     }
01270     else if (pageName == wxT("Boundary Grid"))
01271     {
01272       Report("TODO: Dumping Boundary Grid...\n");
01273       // TODO: call boundaryGrid->DumpGrid();
01274     }
01275   }
01276 
01277   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01278   {
01279     char *string = NULL;
01280 
01281     EX.AddMethodToTree("clParentFrame::OnDumpGrid");
01282     string = EX.PrintError(string);
01283     Report(string);
01284   }
01285 
01286   Report("Done.\n\n");
01287 }

01298                      "About " + wxString(APP_NAME));
01299 }

01301 void clParentFrame::OnSize(wxSizeEvent& event)
01302 {
01303   int w, h;
01304   GetClientSize(&w, &h);
01305 
01306   int xTextPosition = (int)(0);
01307   int yTextPosition = (int)((1-TEXT_HEIGHT)*h);
01308   int xTextSize     = w;
01309   int yTextSize     = (int)(TEXT_HEIGHT*h);
01310   textWindow->SetSize(xTextPosition, yTextPosition, xTextSize, yTextSize);
01311 
01312   int xTreePosition = (int)(0);
01313   int yTreePosition = (int)(0);
01314   int xTreeSize     = (int)(TREE_WIDTH*w);
01315   int yTreeSize     = (int)((1-TEXT_HEIGHT)*h-1);
01316   treeControl->SetSize(xTreePosition, yTreePosition, xTreeSize, yTreeSize);
01317 
01318   int xClientPosition = (int)(TREE_WIDTH*w+1);
01319   int yClientPosition = (int)(0);
01320   int xClientSize     = (int)((1-TREE_WIDTH)*w-1);
01321   int yClientSize     = (int)((1-TEXT_HEIGHT)*h-1);
01322 
01323 //  GetClientWindow()->SetSize(xClientPosition, yClientPosition, xClientSize, yClientSize);
01324 //  GetClientWindow()->SetClientSize(xClientSize, yClientSize);
01325 }
